mapper.select: select distinct(date) from points where car_num = #{car_num}

select date, max(to_timestamp(time, 'HH24:MI:SS'))-min(to_timestamp(time, 'HH24:MI:SS')) as time, round((count(case when noise >= 80 and rpm >= 1500 then 1 end) * 100.0) / count(*), 2) as ratio from points where car_num = #{car_num} and date = #{date} group by date
select * from points where car_num = #{car_num} and date = #{date} order by time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into temp_gps (car_num, date, time, longitude, latitude) values (#{car_num}, #{date}, #{time}, #{longitude}, #{latitude})
insert into temp_rpm (car_num, date, time, rpm) values (#{car_num}, #{date}, #{time}, #{rpm})
insert into temp_noise (car_num, date, time, noise) values (#{car_num}, #{date}, #{time}, #{noise})

insert into points (car_num, date, time, lon, lat, noise, rpm, geom) select temp_gps.car_num, temp_gps.date, temp_gps.time, temp_gps.longitude, temp_gps.latitude, temp_noise.noise, temp_rpm.rpm, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(temp_gps.longitude::numeric, temp_gps.latitude::numeric), 4326) from temp_gps join temp_noise on temp_gps.car_num = temp_noise.car_num and temp_gps.date = temp_noise.date and temp_gps.time = temp_noise.time join temp_rpm on temp_gps.car_num = temp_rpm.car_num and temp_gps.date = temp_rpm.date and temp_gps.time = temp_rpm.time
insert into course (car_num, date, geom) select car_num, date, ST_MakeLine(geom order by time) from points group by car_num, date
